964FECD28AE940C5922997CE457E8F5F.description: Students will present at the Intermediate Low level in a written presentation.

08522DBFE26649BCA2B2D12C2BE89F81.description: Students will present at the Intermediate Low level in a spoken presentation.

52AA1960334A4658A82D3668303A9412.description: Presentational: All students will be able to use a foreign language other than English to present information, concepts, and ideas, while also gaining an understanding of the perspectives of other cultures. Through language study, they will make connections with other content areas, compare the language and culture studied with their own, and participate in home and global communities.

8971F1D9552C4A9EB28F1D366F259B13.description: Student will perform at Intermediate Low level in written communication (2 way)

3361E96D73CA4B3999989884C32882CE.description: Student will perform at Intermediate Low level in spoken communication (2 way)

A9BB885D9DBA4189B717750A8B8CDC7B.description: Interpersonal: All students will be able to use a foreign language other than English to negotiate meaning through the spoken or written exchange of information, concepts, and ideas, while gaining an understanding of the relationships among the products, practices, and perspectives of other cultures. Through language study, they will make connections with other content areas, compare the language and culture studied with their own, and participate in home and global communities.

80CB8E8BD3884DE8A678DC8384A77D1C.description: Student will perform at Intermediate Low level while reading culturally authentic printed material.

C359815C34914235AB1C4208B353AF9E.description: Student will perform at Intermediate Low level while viewing a culturally authentic audio-visual source.

60C385E890094C6FB271962323264058.description: Student will perform at Intermediate Low level while listening to a culturally authentic audio source.

14B07A4DA6144809B95ED56E0615E4F6.description: Interpretive: All students will be able to use a foreign language other than English to understand and interpret spoken and written language, concepts, and ideas, while also gaining an understanding of the perspectives of other cultures. Through language study, they will make connections with other content areas, compare the language and culture studied with their own, and participate in home and global communities.
